testcase.name: Search for a specific book on Maltapark
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Maltapark website.........................................passed When I click on the "All Classifieds" dropdown..............................passed And I select "Books" from the dropdown......................................passed And I enter "Computer" in the search area...................................passed And I click the search button...............................................passed Then I should see the description and price of the first item in the list...passed
